(ModalContext.java:101)

Looking at the stack trace, the origin is coming from a IResourceDelta.REMOVED
resource change which calls asyncStructureChanged.  Then asyncStructureChanged
receives an NPE while trying to get a display instance.

From an aerial view, it seems that the editor/editor site in
asyncStructureChanged returns null as we try to get a display instance.

The good news is that it does not appear to be a PDE Tools - Migrate to 3.0
issue because no resources are lost in migration. :-)

So here's my offer: 
asyncResourceChanged():
I'm going to add a null check for the editor and editor site.

dispose():
I'm also going to remove InputContextManager as a resourceChangedListener before
we dispose our inputContexts rather than after so that listeners aren't firing
off events as we disassemble ourself.

Changes are in head -- please reopen if this occurs again.

Thanks :)
